a=input()
def is_prime(n):
    t=True
    for i in range(2,int(n**0.5)+1):
        if n%i==0:
            t=False
            break
    return t        
m=False 
i=a           
while  not m:
   
    #i=a+1
    #print i
    j=str(i)
    if j==j[::-1] and is_prime(i)==True:
        m=True
        print i
    else:
         i=i+1
